news.text: Only five days left to back Skyless! Make sure to choose the "Beta update access" reward tier or higher to get the update!  This is part one, part two will come after the campaign, if we meet our goal ðŸ’› it'll include an Alula cloak, a Niko plush, and more
news.title: Skyless Bind Kickstarter

news.text: We will be tabling at SGDQ 2025! (July 6-8) There'll be OneShot and Margin of the Strange merch, as well as some signed copies of "OneShot: World Machine Edition"! You can also swing by and try out playable demos of Margin and OneShot WME. See you there! #OneShotGame
news.title: OneShot SGDQ Event

news.text: OneShot: World Macine Edition is now compatible with macOS! (apple silicon) Get it now during the Golden Week sale on Steam! #oneshotgame
news.title: OneShot on Mac

news.text: OneShot (steam version) is now 8 years old! Wow! Thank you for the 8 wonderful years, everyone!
news.title: OneShot 8th Anniversary
